features: Universal TV Mounting Bracket - Our TV wall mount fits well with brands Samsung, LG, TCL, Hisense, Vizio, Sony, Panasonic, Thomson, Toshiba, Sharp, Philips and other TV brands among 26-60 inch screen sizes, securely supports up to 77lbs LED or LCD flat panel TVs. With MAX VESA/ mounting holds spacing of 400x400mm(16x16”), you can freely mount your TV on concrete or brick wall, even single wood stud.

Sturdy & Strong Mounting Structure - Designed with heavy duty cold rolled steel and 100% welded by automatic robot, our swivel TV mount has gone through 4 times load-bearing tests to hold any TV weight up to 77lbs. Features of strong arms with solid and flexible joint to hold your TV steady while arm extends far away. Quite precised bolt and thread effectively enhance your wall mount for a long-lasting service time.

Full Motion for Customized Viewing Angle - The articulating TV mount allows +/-90°swivel (max. swivel angle depends on TV size) to provide full-motion adjustment capacity for ideal viewing. You can tilt angle ranging from +5°to -15°to reduce glare from lights and extends up 18.3” to get more comforts from any seat in the room, and +/-3°level adjust for maximum viewing flexibility, no more neck or back pain !

Space-saving & Ultra Safe Design - Such a slim and low profile TV mount with an single arm that retracts a mere 2.4” from the wall enables you to position your display at any corner of the house, you can fold to tuck-in closely to the wall when TV left unused. Wall -mounting TV in home theater also protects family safety from TV tip-over, it works perfect as corner TV mount, living room, bedroom, kitchen, studio, office, etc.

Install Your TV Mount in Minutes - All required mounting hardware and detailed graphical installation guide are included to help you install TV without any hassle. Our single stud TV wall mount is designed to the last and backed by reliable after-sale service, limited-lifetime replacement pledge and free technical support. Any questions please feel free to contact us at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERLESMITH Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26″-60″ TVs Transform your viewing experience with this UL-certified full motion TV wall mount. Enhance your entertainment space with flexible angles that allow you to watch TV from anywhere in the room. Thanks to the single-stud design, the wall mount TV bracket is perfect for corner mounting.
Upgrade to exceptional TV support with our full motion TV bracket. Rigorously tested to withstand 6,000 extension cycles, the sturdy design ensures long-lasting support and peace of mind.

Setup is fast and easy with the detailed instruction manual and clearly-labeled hardware for added convenience. Best of all, you can precisely align your television after installation using the ±3° leveling feature.

The TV wall mount fits most 26″-60″ TVs up to 70 lbs with VESA patterns 75x75 to 400x400mm. The TV mount can be installed on single wood studs, concrete, or brick walls. Do not mount on drywall alone. Please locate the ports on the back of your TV to see if the brackets may block any connections.

Multiple TV Mount Brackets Choice Provided ! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: The wall mount was perfect. We had two tvs to mount. We tried one first to see if it would work and if it was easy to install. We’re not handy people but wanted to give it a try. It was so easy to put it that we got another for the second tv. We used it on Samsung TVs and it was a perfect fit! I would recommend this mount for easy installation, good quality at a good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this tv mount was really easy to put up and sturdy! Instructions were clear and comes with everything you need for every type of wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and sturdy installation for TVs big and small
reviews.reviewText: Mounted a 55” tv that we needed to come out from the wall at an angle. Much cheaper than other alternates, tv is attached very sturdily to wall and mount. Easy to move tv. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to instal comes with instructions very easy to read and understand stand. Fit my 55 inch tv perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install and very sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Was very easy to install. Didn’t take long at all. Love the “move-a-bility”! Very sturdy as well when you make sure it is secured into a stud. No issues at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used to hang my 50" samsung.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install fit my Samsung 50" TV and had no issues. Swivels in all directions and hold the weight of the tv without issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple 3 screw installation. Just find a stud. Very adjustable and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: What a great product, price, packaging, pure perfection. Fast easy installation. Good instructions. I couldn’t be happier.
I’m blown away with how easy this was to mount , did a 55” in the corner of the roomTook so little time to do, and it’s very sturdy
Fácil de instalar. Los materiales se sienten de buena calidad y resistentes.
Great product!!!! Great price, Great quality!!!!

Me gustó la resistencia del material, de muy buena calidad, pero no es nada claro el instructivo para instalar. Debes ingeniartelas para localizar la posición ideal de tu soporte con respecto a tu televisor, ya que ninguna marca es igual a otra.Yo lo use en una Pantalla Sharp 50" y ninguna plantilla VESA era parecida a la de mi televisor, tuve que ver cuál era la mejor posición de instalarlo, hasta que quedé conforme.Los tornillos de fijación de los que muchos se quejaron, no tienen nungún fundamento, el instructivo es claro, debes usar una llave "matraca" para no romperlos y eso es suficiente para una instalación perfecta.
Very sturdy, easy to install must be read well the manual but not hard to figure out. The downside is that they don't include the wrench tool to screw the bolts that's why I only give 4 stars .
